original: Majjhima Nikāya 105
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Sunakkhattasutta
analyzed: sunakkhattasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā vesāliyam viharati mahā vane kūṭāgāra sālāya

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulehi bhikkhūhi bhagavato santike aññā byākatā hoti:
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulehi bhikkhūhi bhagavato santike aññā byākatā hoti

original: “‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmā”ti.
analyzed: brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāma ati

original: Assosi kho sunakkhatto licchaviputto:
analyzed: assosi kho sunakkhattaḥ licchavi putto

original: “sambahulehi kira bhikkhūhi bhagavato santike aññā byākatā hoti:
analyzed: sambahulehi kira bhikkhūhi bhagavato santike aññā byākatā hoti

original: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmā’”ti.
analyzed: brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāma ati

original: Atha kho sunakkhatto licchaviputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ
analyzed: atha kho sunakkhattaḥ licchavi puttaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavanta

original: abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho sunakkhatto licchaviputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho sunakkhattaḥ licchavi puttaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “sutaṁ metaṁ, bhante:
analyzed: sutam mā ita bhante

original: ‘sambahulehi kira bhikkhūhi bhagavato santike aññā byākatā—
analyzed: sambahulehi kira bhikkhūhi bhagavato santike aññā byākatā

original: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmā’ti.
analyzed: brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāma ati

original: Ye te, bhante, bhikkhū bhagavato santike aññaṁ byākaṁsu:
analyzed: ye te bhante bhikkhū bhagavato santike aññam

original: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmā’ti,
analyzed: brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāma ati

original: kacci te, bhante, bhikkhū sammadeva aññaṁ byākaṁsu udāhu santetthekacce bhikkhū adhimānena aññaṁ byākaṁsū”ti?
analyzed: kacci te bhante bhikkhū sammat eva aññam udāhu santā itthā ekacce bhikkhū adhimānena aññam byākasūti

original: “Ye te, sunakkhatta, bhikkhū mama santike aññaṁ byākaṁsu:
analyzed: ye te sunakkhatta bhikkhū mama santike aññam byākasu

original: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmā’ti.
analyzed: brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāma ati

original: Santetthekacce bhikkhū sammadeva aññaṁ byākaṁsu, santi panidhekacce bhikkhū adhimānenapi aññaṁ byākaṁsu.
analyzed: santi itthā ikacce bhikkhū sammad eva aññam santi adhimānena api aññam

original: Tatra, sunakkhatta, ye te bhikkhū sammadeva aññaṁ byākaṁsu tesaṁ taṁ tatheva hoti;
analyzed: tatra sunakkhatta ye te bhikkhū sammat eva aññam tesam tam tathā iva hoti

original: ye pana te bhikkhū adhimānena aññaṁ byākaṁsu tatra, sunakkhatta, tathāgatassa evaṁ hoti:
analyzed: ye pana te bhikkhū adhimānena aññam tatra sunakkhatta tathāgatassa evam hoti

original: ‘dhammaṁ nesaṁ desessan’ti.
analyzed: dhammam na esam desessanti

original: Evañcettha, sunakkhatta, tathāgatassa hoti:
analyzed: evam ca ittha sunakkhatta tathāgatassa hoti

original: ‘dhammaṁ nesaṁ desessan’ti.
analyzed: dhammam na esam desessanti

original: Atha ca panidhekacce moghapurisā pañhaṁ abhisaṅkharitvā abhisaṅkharitvā tathāgataṁ upasaṅkamitvā pucchanti.
analyzed: atha ca panidhā ikacce mogha purisāḥ pañham abhisaṅkharitvā abhisaṅkharitvā tathāgatam upasaṅkamitvā pucchanti

original: Tatra, sunakkhatta, yampi tathāgatassa evaṁ hoti:
analyzed: tatra sunakkhatta yat pi tathāgatassa evam hoti

original: ‘dhammaṁ nesaṁ desessan’ti tassapi hoti aññathattan”ti.
analyzed: dhammam na īsam desessanti tassa api hoti aññathattan ti

original: “Etassa bhagavā kālo, etassa sugata kālo,
analyzed: etassa bhagavā kālaḥ etassa sugata kālaḥ

original: yaṁ bhagavā dhammaṁ deseyya. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
analyzed: yam bhagavā dhammaṃ deseyya bhagavataḥ sutvā bhikkhū dhāressanti iti

original: “Tena hi, sunakkhatta, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi sunakkhatta suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho sunakkhatto licchaviputto bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho sunakkhattaḥ licchavi putto bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Bhagavā etadavoca—
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: Pañca kho ime, sunakkhatta, kāmaguṇā.
analyzed: pañca kho ime sunakkhatta kāma guṇā

original: Katame pañca?
analyzed: katame pañca

original: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā,
analyzed: cakkhu viññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piya rūpā kāma upasahitā rajanīyā

original: sotaviññeyyā saddā …pe…
analyzed: sota viññeyyā saddāḥ pe

original: ghānaviññeyyā gandhā …
analyzed: ghāna viññeyyāḥ gandhāḥ

original: jivhāviññeyyā rasā …
analyzed: jivhā viññeyyāḥ rasāḥ

original: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā—
analyzed: kāya viññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piya rūpā kāma upasahitā rajanīyā

original: ime kho, sunakkhatta, pañca kāmaguṇā.
analyzed: ime kho sunakkhatta pañca kāmaguṇā

original: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ, sunakkhatta, vijjati yaṁ idhekacco purisapuggalo lokāmisādhimutto assa.
analyzed: ṭhānam kho pana ita sunakkhatta vijjati yat idha ekaccaḥ purisa puggalaḥ loka āmisa adhimuttaḥ assa

original: Lokāmisādhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatirūpī ceva kathā saṇṭhāti, tadanudhammañca anuvitakketi, anuvicāreti, tañca purisaṁ bhajati, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati;
analyzed: loka āmisa adhimuttassa kho sunakkhatta purisa puggalassa tad patirūpī ca iva kathā saṇṭhāti tad anudhammam ca anuvitakketi anuvicāreti tam ca purisam bhajati tena ca vittim āpajjati

original: āneñjapaṭisaṁyuttāya ca pana kathāya kacchamānāya na sussūsati, na sotaṁ odahati, na aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na ca taṁ purisaṁ bhajati, na ca tena vittiṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: āneñja paṭisayuttāya ca pana kathāya kacchamānāya na sussūsati na sotam odahati na aññā cittam upaṭṭhāpeti na ca tam purisam bhajati na ca tena vittim āpajjati

original: Seyyathāpi, sunakkhatta, puriso sakamhā gāmā vā nigamā vā ciravippavuttho assa.
analyzed: seyyathā api sunakkhatta purisaḥ sakamhā gāmā vā nigamā vā cira vippavutthaḥ assa

original: So aññataraṁ purisaṁ passeyya tamhā gāmā vā nigamā vā acirapakkantaṁ.
analyzed: so aññataram purisam passeyya tamhā gāmā vā nigamā vā acira pakkanta

original: So taṁ purisaṁ tassa gāmassa vā nigamassa vā khematañca subhikkhatañca appābādhatañca puccheyya;
analyzed: saḥ tam purisam tassa gāmassa vā nigamassa vā khema tañca subhikkha tañca appa ābādha tañca puccheyya

original: tassa so puriso tassa gāmassa vā nigamassa vā khematañca subhikkhatañca appābādhatañca saṁseyya.
analyzed: tassa so puriso tassa gāmassa vā nigamassa vā khema tañca subhikkha tañca appa ābādha tañca saseyya

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, sunakkhatta,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi sunakkhatta

original: api nu so puriso tassa purisassa sussūseyya, sotaṁ odaheyya, aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpeyya, tañca purisaṁ bhajeyya, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
analyzed: api nu so puriso tassa purisassa sussūseyya sotam odaheyya aññā cittam upaṭṭhāpeyya tam ca purisam bhajeyya tena ca vittim āpajjeyya ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: “Evameva kho, sunakkhatta, ṭhānametaṁ vijjati yaṁ idhekacco purisapuggalo lokāmisādhimutto assa.
analyzed: evam eva kho sunakkhatta ṭhānam etam vijjati yat idha ekaccaḥ purisa puggalaḥ loka āmisa adhimuttaḥ assa

original: Lokāmisādhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatirūpī ceva kathā saṇṭhāti, tadanudhammañca anuvitakketi, anuvicāreti, tañca purisaṁ bhajati, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati;
analyzed: loka āmisa adhimuttassa kho sunakkhatta purisa puggalassa tad patirūpī ca iva kathā saṇṭhāti tad anudhammam ca anuvitakketi anuvicāreti tam ca purisam bhajati tena ca vittim āpajjati

original: āneñjapaṭisaṁyuttāya ca pana kathāya kacchamānāya na sussūsati, na sotaṁ odahati, na aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na ca taṁ purisaṁ bhajati, na ca tena vittiṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: āneñja paṭisayuttāya ca pana kathāya kacchamānāya na sussūsati na sotam odahati na aññā cittam upaṭṭhāpeti na ca tam purisam bhajati na ca tena vittim āpajjati

original: So evamassa veditabbo:
analyzed: saḥ evam assa veditabbaḥ

original: ‘āneñjasaṁyojanena hi kho visaṁyutto lokāmisādhimutto purisapuggalo’ti.
analyzed: āneñjasayojanena hi kho visa yutto loka āmisa adhimutto purisa puggalo ti

original: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ, sunakkhatta, vijjati yaṁ idhekacco purisapuggalo āneñjādhimutto assa.
analyzed: ṭhānam kho pana ita sunakkhatta vijjati yat idha ekaccaḥ purisa puggalaḥ āneñja adhimuttaḥ assa

original: Āneñjādhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatirūpī ceva kathā saṇṭhāti, tadanudhammañca anuvitakketi, anuvicāreti, tañca purisaṁ bhajati, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati;
analyzed: āneñja adhimuttassa kho sunakkhatta purisa puggalassa tad patirūpī ca iva kathā saṇṭhāti tad anudhammam ca anuvitakketi anuvicāreti tam ca purisam bhajati tena ca vittim āpajjati

original: lokāmisapaṭisaṁyuttāya ca pana kathāya kacchamānāya na sussūsati, na sotaṁ odahati, na aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na ca taṁ purisaṁ bhajati, na ca tena vittiṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: loka āmisa paṭisayuttāya ca pana kathāya kacchamānāya na sussūsati na sotam odahati na aññā cittam upaṭṭhāpeti na ca tam purisam bhajati na ca tena vittim āpajjati

original: Seyyathāpi, sunakkhatta, paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritattāya;
analyzed: seyyathā api sunakkhatta paṇḍu palāsaḥ bandhanā pavuttaḥ abhabbaḥ harita ttāya

original: evameva kho, sunakkhatta, āneñjādhimuttassa purisapuggalassa ye lokāmisasaṁyojane se pavutte.
analyzed: evam eva kho sunakkhatta āneñja adhimuttassa purisa puggalassa ye loka āmisa sayojane se pavutte

original: So evamassa veditabbo:
analyzed: saḥ evam assa veditabbaḥ

original: ‘lokāmisasaṁyojanena hi kho visaṁyutto āneñjādhimutto purisapuggalo’ti.
analyzed: loka āmisa sayojanena hi kho visa yuttaḥ āneñja adhimutto purisa puggalo ti

original: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ, sunakkhatta, vijjati yaṁ idhekacco purisapuggalo ākiñcaññāyatanādhimutto assa.
analyzed: ṭhānam kho pana ita sunakkhatta vijjati yat idha ekaccaḥ purisa puggalaḥ ākiñcaññāyatana adhimuttaḥ assa

original: Ākiñcaññāyatanādhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatirūpī ceva kathā
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatana adhimuttassa kho sunakkhatta purisa puggalassa tad patirūpī ca iva kathā

original: saṇṭhāti, tadanudhammañca anuvitakketi, anuvicāreti, tañca purisaṁ bhajati, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati;
analyzed: tad anudhammam ca anuvitakketi anuvicāreti tam ca purisam bhajati tena ca vittim āpajjati

original: āneñjapaṭisaṁyuttāya ca pana kathāya kacchamānāya na sussūsati, na sotaṁ odahati, na aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na ca taṁ purisaṁ bhajati, na ca tena vittiṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: āneñja paṭisayuttāya ca pana kathāya kacchamānāya na sussūsati na sotam odahati na aññā cittam upaṭṭhāpeti na ca tam purisam bhajati na ca tena vittim āpajjati

original: Seyyathāpi, sunakkhatta, puthusilā dvedhābhinnā appaṭisandhikā hoti;
analyzed: seyyathā api sunakkhatta puthu silā dvedhā abhinnā appaṭisandhikā hoti

original: evameva kho, sunakkhatta, ākiñcaññāyatanādhimuttassa purisapuggalassa ye āneñjasaṁyojane se bhinne.
analyzed: evam eva kho sunakkhatta ākiñcaññāyatana adhimuttassa purisa puggalassa ye āneñjasayojane se bhinne

original: So evamassa veditabbo:
analyzed: saḥ evam assa veditabbaḥ

original: ‘āneñjasaṁyojanena hi kho visaṁyutto ākiñcaññāyatanādhimutto purisapuggalo’ti.
analyzed: āneñjasayojanena hi kho visa yuttaḥ ākiñcaññāyatana adhimutto purisa puggalo ti

original: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ, sunakkhatta, vijjati yaṁ idhekacco purisapuggalo nevasaññānāsaññāyatanādhimutto assa.
analyzed: ṭhānam kho pana ita sunakkhatta vijjati yat idha ekaccaḥ purisa puggalaḥ na ivasaññā nāsañña āyatana adhimuttaḥ assa

original: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanādhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatirūpī
analyzed: nevasaññānāsaññāyatana adhimuttassa kho sunakkhatta purisa puggalassa tad patirūpī

original: ceva kathā saṇṭhāti, tadanudhammañca anuvitakketi, anuvicāreti, tañca purisaṁ bhajati,
analyzed: ca iva kathā tad anudhammam ca anuvitakketi anuvicāreti tam ca purisam bhajati

original: tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati;
analyzed: tena ca vittim āpajjati

original: ākiñcaññāyatanapaṭisaṁyuttāya ca pana kathāya kacchamānāya na sussūsati, na sotaṁ odahati, na aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na ca taṁ purisaṁ bhajati, na ca tena vittiṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatana paṭisayuttāya ca pana kathāya kacchamānāya na sussūsati na sotam odahati na aññā cittam upaṭṭhāpeti na ca tam purisam bhajati na ca tena vittim āpajjati

original: Seyyathāpi, sunakkhatta, puriso manuññabhojanaṁ bhuttāvī chaḍḍeyya.
analyzed: sa iyyathā api sunakkhatta purisaḥ manuñña bhojanam bhuttāvī chaḍḍeyya

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, sunakkhatta,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi sunakkhatta

original: api nu tassa purisassa tasmiṁ bhatte puna bhottukamyatā assā”ti?
analyzed: api nu tassa purisassa tasmin bhatte puna bhottu kamya tā assa ati

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Taṁ kissa hetu”?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: “Aduñhi, bhante, bhattaṁ paṭikūlasammatan”ti.
analyzed: adut hi bhante bhattam paṭikūla sammatan ti

original: “Evameva kho, sunakkhatta, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanādhimuttassa purisapuggalassa ye ākiñcaññāyatanasaṁyojane se vante.
analyzed: evam eva kho sunakkhatta nevasaññānāsaññāyatana adhimuttassa purisa puggalassa ye ākiñcaññāyatana sayojane se vante

original: So evamassa veditabbo:
analyzed: saḥ evam assa veditabbaḥ

original: ‘ākiñcaññāyatanasaṁyojanena hi kho visaṁyutto nevasaññānāsaññāyatanādhimutto purisapuggalo’ti.
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatana sayojanena hi kho visayuttaḥ nevasaññānāsaññāyatana adhimutto purisa puggalo ti

original: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ, sunakkhatta, vijjati yaṁ idhekacco purisapuggalo sammā nibbānādhimutto assa.
analyzed: ṭhānam kho pana ita sunakkhatta vijjati yat idha ekaccaḥ purisa puggalaḥ sammā nibbāna adhimuttaḥ assa

original: Sammā nibbānādhimuttassa kho, sunakkhatta, purisapuggalassa tappatirūpī ceva kathā
analyzed: sammā nibbāna adhimuttassa kho sunakkhatta purisa puggalassa tad patirūpī ca iva kathā

original: saṇṭhāti, tadanudhammañca anuvitakketi, anuvicāreti, tañca purisaṁ bhajati, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati;
analyzed: tad anudhammam ca anuvitakketi anuvicāreti tam ca purisam bhajati tena ca vittim āpajjati

original: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanapaṭisaṁyuttāya ca pana kathāya kacchamānāya na sussūsati, na sotaṁ odahati, na aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, na ca taṁ purisaṁ bhajati, na ca tena vittiṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: nevasaññānāsaññāyatana paṭisayuttāya ca pana kathāya kacchamānāya na sussūsati na sotam odahati na aññā cittam upaṭṭhāpeti na ca tam purisam bhajati na ca tena vittim āpajjati

original: Seyyathāpi, sunakkhatta, tālo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna viruḷhiyā;
analyzed: seyyathā api sunakkhatta tālaḥ matthaka chinnaḥ abhabbaḥ puna viruḍhiyā

original: evameva kho, sunakkhatta, sammā nibbānādhimuttassa purisapuggalassa ye nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaṁyojane se ucchinnamūle tālāvatthukate anabhāvaṅkate āyatiṁ anuppādadhamme.
analyzed: evam eva kho sunakkhatta sammā nibbāna adhimuttassa purisa puggalassa ye nevasaññānāsaññāyatana sayojane se ucchinna mūle tālāvatthukate anabhāvaṅkate āyatim an uppāda dhamme

original: So evamassa veditabbo:
analyzed: saḥ evam assa veditabbaḥ

original: ‘nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaṁyojanena hi kho visaṁyutto sammā nibbānādhimutto purisapuggalo’ti.
analyzed: nevasaññānāsaññāyatana sayojanena hi kho visayutto sammā nibbāna adhimutto purisa puggalo ti

original: Ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ, sunakkhatta, vijjati yaṁ idhekaccassa bhikkhuno evamassa:
analyzed: ṭhānam kho pana ita sunakkhatta vijjati yat idha ekaccassa bhikkhuno evam assa

original: ‘taṇhā kho sallaṁ samaṇena vuttaṁ, avijjāvisadoso, chandarāgabyāpādena ruppati.
analyzed: taṇhā kho sallam samaṇena vutta avijjā visa doso chanda rāga byāpādena ruppati

original: Taṁ me taṇhāsallaṁ pahīnaṁ, apanīto avijjāvisadoso, sammā nibbānādhimuttohamasmī’ti.
analyzed: tam me taṇhā sallam pahīna apanītaḥ avijjā visa doso sammā nibbāna adhimuttaḥ ham asmi iti

original: Evaṁmāni assa atathaṁ samānaṁ.

original: kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ anuyuttassa, asappāyaṁ manasā dhammaṁ anuyuttassa rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseyya.

original: So rāgānuddhaṁsitena cittena maraṇaṁ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: saḥ rāga an uddhasitena cittena maraṇam vā nigaccheyya maraṇa mattam vā dukkha

original: Seyyathāpi, sunakkhatta, puriso sallena viddho assa savisena gāḷhūpalepanena.

original: Tassa mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā bhisakkaṁ sallakattaṁ upaṭṭhāpeyyuṁ.
analyzed: tassa mitta amaccāḥ ñāti sālohitāḥ bhisakkam sallakattam upaṭṭhāpeyyu

original: Tassa so bhisakko sallakatto satthena vaṇamukhaṁ parikanteyya.

original: Analañca te antarāyāya.

original: Analañca me antarāyāyā’ti.

analyzed: na ca vaṇa anurakkhī vihareyya na vaṇa sāropī

analyzed: so puthuttam gatena vaṇena maraṇam vā nigaccheyya maraṇa mattam vā dukkha

original: Ayaṁyevettha attho—
analyzed: atthaḥ

original: vaṇoti kho, sunakkhatta, channetaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: vaṇoti kho su nakkhatta channa itam ajjhattikānam āyatanānam adhivacana

original: visadosoti kho, sunakkhatta, avijjāyetaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: visa dosā uti kho su nakkhatta avijjāyetam adhivacana

original: sallanti kho, sunakkhatta, taṇhāyetaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: kho su nakkhatta adhivacana

original: esanīti kho, sunakkhatta, satiyāyetaṁ adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: kho su nakkhatta satiyāya itam

original: satthanti kho, sunakkhatta, ariyāyetaṁ paññāya adhivacanaṁ;
analyzed: sattham ti kho su nakkhatta ariyāya itam paññāya adhivacana

original: bhisakko sallakattoti kho, sunakkhatta, tathāgatassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: bhisakkaḥ sallakatto ti kho sunakkhatta tathāgatassa itam adhivacanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: So vata, sunakkhatta, bhikkhu chasu phassāyatanesu saṁvutakārī ‘upadhi dukkhassa mūlan’ti—
analyzed: saḥ vata sunakkhatta bhikkhu chasu phassa āyatanesu savuta kārī upadhi dukkhassa mūlanti

original: iti viditvā nirupadhi upadhisaṅkhaye vimutto upadhismiṁ vā kāyaṁ upasaṁharissati cittaṁ vā uppādessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: iti viditvā nirupadhi upadhi saṅkhaye vimuttaḥ upadhismin vā kāyam upasaharissati cittam vā uppādessati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Seyyathāpi, sunakkhatta, āpānīyakaṁso vaṇṇasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno;
analyzed: seyyathā api su nakkhattaḥ āpānīyakasaḥ vaṇṇa sampannaḥ gandha sampannaḥ rasa sampannaḥ

original: so ca kho visena saṁsaṭṭho.
analyzed: so ca kho visena sasaṭṭhaḥ

original: Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo dukkhapaṭikūlo.
analyzed: atha purisaḥ āgaccheyya jīvitu kāmaḥ a maritu kāmaḥ sukha kāmaḥ dukkha paṭikūlo

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, sunakkhatta,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi sunakkhatta

original: api nu so puriso amuṁ āpānīyakaṁsaṁ piveyya yaṁ jaññā:
analyzed: api nu saḥ purisaḥ amum āpānīyakasam piveyya yam jaññā

original: ‘imāhaṁ pivitvā maraṇaṁ vā nigacchāmi maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan’”ti?
analyzed: imā aham pivitvā maraṇam vā nigacchāmi maraṇa mattam vā dukkhanti

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Evameva kho, sunakkhatta, so vata bhikkhu chasu phassāyatanesu saṁvutakārī ‘upadhi dukkhassa mūlan’ti—
analyzed: evam eva kho sunakkhatta saḥ vata bhikkhu chasu phassa āyatanesu savuta kārī upadhi dukkhassa mūlanti

original: iti viditvā nirupadhi upadhisaṅkhaye vimutto upadhismiṁ vā kāyaṁ upasaṁharissati cittaṁ vā uppādessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: iti viditvā nirupadhi upadhi saṅkhaye vimuttaḥ upadhismin vā kāyam upasaharissati cittam vā uppādessati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Seyyathāpi, sunakkhatta, āsīviso ghoraviso.
analyzed: seyyathā api su nakkhattaḥ āsīvisaḥ ghora visaḥ

original: Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo dukkhapaṭikūlo.
analyzed: atha purisaḥ āgaccheyya jīvitu kāmaḥ a maritu kāmaḥ sukha kāmaḥ dukkha paṭikūlo

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, sunakkhatta,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi sunakkhatta

original: api nu so puriso amussa āsīvisassa ghoravisassa hatthaṁ vā aṅguṭṭhaṁ vā dajjā yaṁ jaññā:
analyzed: api nu saḥ purisaḥ amussa āsīvisassa ghora visassa hattham vā aṅguṭṭham vā dajjā yam jaññā

original: ‘imināhaṁ daṭṭho maraṇaṁ vā nigacchāmi maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan’”ti?
analyzed: iminā aham daṭṭhaḥ maraṇam vā nigacchāmi maraṇa mattam vā dukkhanti

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Evameva kho, sunakkhatta, so vata bhikkhu chasu phassāyatanesu saṁvutakārī ‘upadhi dukkhassa mūlan’ti—
analyzed: evam eva kho sunakkhatta saḥ vata bhikkhu chasu phassa āyatanesu savuta kārī upadhi dukkhassa mūlanti

original: iti viditvā nirupadhi upadhisaṅkhaye vimutto upadhismiṁ vā kāyaṁ upasaṁharissati cittaṁ vā uppādessatīti—
analyzed: iti viditvā nirupadhi upadhi saṅkhaye vimuttaḥ upadhismim vā kāyam upasaharissati cittam vā uppādessati iti

original: netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”ti.
analyzed: na itam ṭhānam vijjati iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano sunakkhatto licchaviputto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: atta manaḥ sunakkhattaḥ licchavi puttaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti

original: Sunakkhattasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ pañcamaṁ.
analyzed: sunakkhatta suttam niṭṭhitam pañcama
